contextId.information: This simile means Abraham had very many descendants. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: those who were like the stars in the sky for their multitude and like the grains of sand along the seashore, which are uncountable

contextId.information: This compares God disciplining his people to a father disciplining his sons. You can state clearly the understood information. AT: "God deals with you the same way a father deals with his sons" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
contextId.quote: God deals with you as with sons
